description: This file defines a React component named LayersPanel, which provides a user interface for managing layers in a design application. It displays the list of layers, allows renaming, selecting, and deleting layers, and manages internal editing state.

methods.name: LayersPanel()
methods.description: React functional component for displaying and managing a list of layers, including renaming, selecting, and deleting layers.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Starts editing a layer by setting the editingId and temporary name state.

methods.name: commit
methods.description: Commits the renamed layer by invoking the renameLayer action and resetting editing state.
